article: bush administration officials unveiled a bold new assertion of executive authority thursday in the dispute over the firing of nine u.s. attorneys , saying that the justice department will never be allowed to pursue contempt charges initiated by congress against white house officials because the president has invoked executive privilege .
abstract: white house makes broader privilege claim
